.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetBufferMemoryRequirements-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetBufferMemoryRequirements-buffer-parameter]] pname:buffer must: be a valid sname:VkBuffer handle
* [[VUID-vkGetBufferMemoryRequirements-pMemoryRequirements-parameter]] pname:pMemoryRequirements must: be a valid pointer to a sname:VkMemoryRequirements structure
* [[VUID-vkGetBufferMemoryRequirements-buffer-parent]] pname:buffer must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from pname:device
****
